[ syll. ree-ma, re-ema ] The baby girl name Reema is pronounced as RiyihMaa †. Reema is used predominantly in the Arabic language and its origin is also Arabic. Reema is a variation (Arabic) of the name Reem (African, Arabic, and Swahili). Reema is also a variation of the name Rima (Arabic). Reema is rare as a baby girl name.
